widget.name: AgilinkEventManager
widget.description: Agilink Event Manager is a shipment notification that works in combination with your tracking solution and captures shipping and event information in real-time. Statusâ€™ can be delivered via email or EDI or accessed through the Internet. Transentric provides a framework for dispatchers, drivers and transportation providers to give visibility of the shipment status to their customers based upon movement activity. EventManager can help eliminate the question "where is my shipment?"
widget.author: Agilink EventManager
